review: Love it.  Very easy set-up.  The remote is very easy to use.  Fast response.  Highly recommend!
author: D. Biddle "Damon"

review: It's seems to be working great. Nice streaming from Amazon and NetFlix and I like the ease of using the Remote. Amazon needs to make the remote easier to open to install the batteries - I needed a screwdriver to get it open.
author: Marisa A. Pierson

review: Do not buy unless the only thing you every want to watch anything on is Amazon.  Has no Vudu and per tech support Netflix and Amazon are having compatability issues between the software so Netflix does not work correctly.  When contacted tech support about Netflix issue just got excuse and that they did not know when issue would be solved.  I have a roku on my other tv and am much happier with its operation and options.
author: Misty

review: The only thing that works decent on here is amazon prime.  Netflix messes up all the time.  I hate the fire stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Had to return the first one after two weeks of dealing with tech support.  Received the second one and it wouldn't even work.  Thirty more minutes with tech support and I'm told the replacement one was defective as well.  Guess I'll get a Roku or Chromecast instead.
author: Mateo76 "Hot Sauce'n"

review: Had Google Chrome & debated getting Apple TV - Fire TV combines the best of both! Great interface, easy to use and having a Prime membership is a major plus too!
author: MS3131

review: I'm also experiencing the green screen issue with my Panasonic Plasma (ST50).  Once Amazon fixes this I will likely change my review to 5 stars.
author: Amazon Customer

review: My brother got me this for Christmas.  I wanted something for my bedroom TV,  I have Apple TV and wanted something different. It was on back order so it arrived late but I'm patient so that was okay.  However, it has trouble keeping connected to my network. I've had to disconnect it and unplug it a few times, tonight nothing worked ... I've reset the network connection, unplugged it, disconnected it, still won't connect!  All my other devices are connecting fine so it's not my network.  Guess I have to just use my Apple TV  no problems there, I am disappointed!
author: Vicki

review: Easy setup. However very restricted unless you get apps that are unethical to use. I have the kindle fire hdx7 as well, same thing there. Terrible user interface except for shopping. Just what we all need is another os to learn. Silk browser is not very users friendly, however I have to be fair. Until I use it for a longer period of time, I will be open minded, I would not buy Kindle products again though, I would definitely stick with ANDROID BASED (my opinion only)
author: TW

review: I am totality pleased with my new Amazon Firestick!!!! It is everything they say it is plus more. I would recommend the Firestick to everyone!!!!!!
